name: Essence Scram
description: Drains you of Essence repeatedly inflicting 40-60 + 50% Weapon Damage to nearby enemies, restoring 25% to 35% maximum Health to group members and you, granting temporary damage immunity, removing Expose and Dizzy effects. You become briefly invulerable to damage and your Expose statuses are removed. This power can be used while suffering from Control Effects to escape and can be instantly Flash-Cast.
